title: 7/19/17 - Acid attacks riding in Britain, but the media doesn't understand why
description:
Drip. Drip. Drip. More details between President Trump & Russia are leaking ...Holding out hope for Charlie Gard ... Entrepreneur Tom Scott visits Glenn to discuss the climate of business in 2017 ...The amazing story behind Nantucket Nectars ...The power of addiction ...Aaron Brower discusses the staggering statistics of addiction and the incredible epidemic of opioid use in America

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
